DOC.brief_summary: Our aim is to access whether we can achieve equivalent pregnancy rates by the addition of six doses of luteal support with recLH after agonist triggering for IVF cycles in the absence of OHSS.
DOC.brief_title: Luteal Supplementation With Rec-LH After GnRH-agonist Triggering in In Vitro (IVF)
DOC.detailed_description: Whether pregnancy outcome after GnRH-agonist triggering could be improved by adding luteal recLH support plus progesterone, compared to that observed after ovulation triggering with HCG in GnRH antagonist stimulated cycles.
DOC.criteria: < 36years, single blastocystET, FSH < 12 endometriosis, 3 and 4, pco, frozen sperm
